issue.title: urdf model is not able to be loaded by gzweb

content.raw: I wouldn't expect the robot to look like that if it were a problem with the URDF though. It seems to be more of a problem reading the underlying mesh file (collada / obj / stl). You could try loading a simple SDF with just the mesh you have to see if the problem persists. Also, have you checked that it is loaded properly with `gzclient` (i.e. `gazebo`)?
content.html: I wouldn't expect the robot to look like that if it were a problem with the URDF though. It seems to be more of a problem reading the underlying mesh file (collada / obj / stl). You could try loading a simple SDF with just the mesh you have to see if the problem persists. Also, have you checked that it is loaded properly with gzclient (i.e. gazebo)?
